person.persName: John Calvin Skaggs (Green County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of William B. Skaggs and Nancy Skaggs. Married to Nancy Skaggs in Green County, Kentucky, on September 10, 1850. Father of John A. Skaggs, James D. Skaggs, and Mary J. Skaggs. Separated from Nancy Skaggs. Married Arabelle Davis Skaggs in LaRue County, Kentucky, in February 1865. Father of Malissa J. Skaggs. Farmer in Green County in 1860. Served in the 13th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from December 31, 1861, to February 14, 1863. Reported as deserted in Hart County, Kentucky, on February 14, 1863. Served in the 37th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from October 24, 1863, to December 29, 1864.
